did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Slides, correspondence, research materials, reports, publications.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Files relating to the Cornell Geology Department, especially department meetings and curriculum changes.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Professor Emeritus, Earth and Atmospheric Sciences.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Files relating to the Cornell Geology Department, especially department meetings and curriculum changes.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Arthur L. Bloom Papers, #16-14-4167. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

Recent crustal movement Global Survey of Canada (GSC)
Bloom 1963 American Journal of Science - Late Pleistocene - movements in Maine
